card.name: Marrow-Mask Mendicant
card.text: Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.) Whenever Marrow-Mask Mendicant deals combat damage to a player, choose a creature that player controls. Marrow-Mask Mendicant becomes a copy of that creature, except it has this ability and "This creature has protection from creatures with the same name."

card.name: Thaumaturgy Savant
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library at any time. You may cast instant and sorcery spells from the top of your library. Spend only mana produced by Treasures to cast spells this way.
